scripts.prepublishOnly: svn checkout https://github.com/SteamRE/SteamKit/trunk/Resources/Protobufs protobufs && svn checkout https://github.com/SteamRE/SteamKit/trunk/Resources/SteamLanguage steam_language && node steam_language_parser/shoehorn.js
